name: Healthcare MCP Plugins
description: MCP server plugins for the Claude Healthcare Launch marketplace

plugins.name: CMS Coverage MCP
plugins.description: Medicare coverage policies including National Coverage Determinations (NCDs) and Local Coverage Determinations (LCDs). Required for prior authorization coverage policy lookup.

plugins.name: NPI Registry MCP
plugins.description: Healthcare provider verification via the National Plan and Provider Enumeration System (NPPES). Required for provider credential verification in prior authorization.

plugins.name: PubMed MCP
plugins.description: Search and retrieve medical literature from PubMed/MEDLINE. Useful for clinical research, evidence-based medicine, and clinical trial protocol development.

healthcare-coverage.name: Healthcare Coverage
healthcare-coverage.description: MCP servers for insurance coverage policies and medical necessity determination

healthcare-provider.name: Healthcare Provider
healthcare-provider.description: MCP servers for provider verification and credentialing

medical-literature.name: Medical Literature
medical-literature.description: MCP servers for medical research and publications
